name: Cockadoodleduel
description:
Four chickens, one arena, only one will leave alive. The game is simple, you can move, peck or claw.  Collect Super Eggs to gain an edge on the competition. Find a shield egg and you're protected, an electric egg to get a burst of energy, a heart egg to be healed, or a metal egg to grow claws. The game uses r e a l i s t i c physics to simulate what a real cock fight would be like.

Who will be the dominant chicken? Fight your friends to find out!

Cockadoodleduel is a 4 Player Local Multiplayer game, it uses the following controls:

Player 1: WASD - Move, Q - Claw, E - Peck
Player 2: IJKL - Move, Q - Claw, E - Peck
Player 3: TFGH - Move, Q - Claw, E - Peck
Player 4: Arrow Keys - Move, Left Mouse - Claw, Right Mouse - Peck
